name: Himmelfrau
description:
The current build is barely a proof of concept. I was a bit greedy and wasn't able to finish it or even make an actual game but I'm quite happy with the grounds I set up so I put It here as a stand-in that I will continue to update over the week. Hopefully it will be playable by next monday.

Controls

WASD - Move

I - Melee Attack (current animation is a stand-in)

O - Make Doll (current animation is a stand-in)Transfoms the corpse at your feet into a doll that you can control

Left and Right arrows - Cycle trough your characters
